meeting_context: At our October meeting you mentioned you were piloting with 2 design partners and targeting an enterprise rollout in Q1.

messages.subject: Northwind AI - quick intro
messages.body_text: Great meeting you. Attaching a short overview. Would love to keep you posted.

messages.subject: Re: Northwind AI - quick intro
messages.body_text: Thanks Avery. Really interesting, but I think this is too early for us. Please keep me posted and let's revisit once you have a few more deployments.
